title: update failed
body:
ever since i did the 4.21 patch update it has been saying update failed as soon as i clicked on the league of legends icon to open the game
it says "Update Failed, unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information"
please help :)

replies.body:
try to repair the game, but b4 that try putting your ip to:8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4

This helped me alot   :D
